short_summary: Veterans Affairs Canada is seeking the services of a contractor to provide a hybrid digital platform to assist the department with the Women Veterans Forum and the Stakeholders Forum scheduled for March 5-8, 2024
description: The department is seeking the services of a contractor to provide a hybrid digital platform to assist the department with the Women Veterans Forum and the Stakeholders Forum scheduled for March 5-8, 2024
full_summary:
Veterans Affairs Canada 2024 Women Veterans Forum and 2024 Stakeholders Forum Hybrid Event Digital Platform
==========================================================

### Tender Information

*   **Tender No.:** 3000773207
*   **Tender Title:** Veterans Affairs Canada 2024 Women Veterans Forum and 2024 Stakeholders Forum Hybrid Event Digital Platform
*   **Publication Date:** December 6, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 5, 2024, at 10:00 AM
*   **Tender Status:** Cancelled

### Introduction

Veterans Affairs Canada is seeking the services of a contractor to provide a hybrid digital platform for the 2024 Women Veterans Forum and the 2024 Stakeholders Forum. The successful contractor will be required to provide a platform that will enable the department to deliver a high-quality virtual experience for attendees.

### Key Requirements

The contractor will be required to provide the following services:

*   Design, development, and implementation of a hybrid digital platform
*   Provide a user-friendly interface for attendees to navigate and engage with the platform
*   Ensure the platform is accessible on various devices and browsers
*  Provide technical support during the event

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

*   Development of a hybrid digital platform
*   Testing and deployment of the platform
*   Provision of technical support during the event
*   Post-event analysis and reporting

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Technical merit (40%)
*   Price (60%)

### Important Note

*   This tender has been cancelled.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Susan O'Brien
Susan.obrien@veterans.gc.ca
1902-3148488
